actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Financing Bank of 1973 to prohibit the Bank from financing sales of military weapons, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Financing Bank Act of 1973 to prohibit the Federal Financing Bank from financing the purchase of (1) any defense article, defense service, or construction materials or services for the use of the armed services of any foreign country or (2) any defense article or service by the government of any foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Financing Bank of 1973 to prohibit the Bank from financing sales of military weapons, and for other purposes.
